description: These pants know what climbers want: absolute freedom of movement and the liberating feeling of lightness. The unbeatable combo of polyamide and elastane wears as light as a feather, but is incredibly durable. One of the two pockets keeps your smartphone in place with an elastic mesh insert, while the zippered back pocket keeps everything in place, even upside down. And thanks to the elasticated cuffs on the trouser legs, you can always keep an eye on your top-level footwork. Allez!
name: Mammut Massone Light Pants, Reg - Mens
